item.description:
EVENT: Enjoy a place that is noted for its well-groomed trails up in New Ipswich NH, just an hour and 3/4 North of Boston. The area has trails for beginner, intermediate and expert skiing that includes a warming hut and a view of Mt. Monadnock. Windblown also has a rustic lodge with a fireplace and wood burning stoves to easily relax by and enjoy a hot cup of soup and some lunch. Check Windblown's web site for directions, ski conditions, and more, http://www.windblownx.... Group lessons are available. Some people have already made plans to relax over dinner at Baily's Bar and Grill in Townsend MA and right on the way home.

Trip Coordinator: Nancy R and David G
RSVP: Required by Friday at 9pm More details and a phone number will be provided when you RSVP.
MEET: 10:00 on the upper level of Windblownâ€™s Base Lodge.
COST: $17 for XC trail pass / $10 for Snowshoe, and Rentals are: $18 for skis / $12 for snowshoes, plus $5 if you're not a fully paid Mosaic member. Windblown does not accept credit cards so plan to bring sufficient cash to cover trail passes, rentals, lessons and snacks.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Cross Country Ski And Snowshoe at the Windblown
